text: Hagi anante nagra amanage hu'na zamasami'noe, tagra monafi Anumzamofo eri'za vahe mani'nonankita ama ana eri'zana enerisanunkeno, taza huno tazeri so'ea hugahie. Hianagi ama Jerusalemi kumapina tamagrira tamagia omane'ne. Ana higeno tamagehe'zanena kora ama kumapinena zamagia omane'nea vahe mani'naze.
